entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, West Nipissing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:16 a.m. EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, -4.3Â°C

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High 10.
entry.summary: Clearing. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 10. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 9 April 2023
